text: The Journey of Natty Gann is a 1985 American family adventure movie directed by Jeremy Paul Kagan and starring Meredith Salenger, John Cusack, Ray Wise, Lainie Kazan, Scatman Crothers, Barry Miller, Garry Chalk, Bruce Boa. It was distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1985 adventure movies Category:1980s family movies Category:American family movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Jeremy Kagan Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies about families Category:Movies set in Washington (state) Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Disney movies
title: The Journey of Natty Gann
